title: LOL - Bad Image d3dx9_39.dll error
body:
Just installed LOL on a new pc. Directx 11 is updated and installed. I can get into queue and through champion select but as the game would go to load screen an error pops up - 

League of Legends.exe - Bad Image
C:\Windows\SYSTEM32\d3dx9_39.dllis either not designed to run on windows or it contains an error. Try installing the program again using the original installation media. Error status 0xc000012f

I've re-installed lol 3 times. I'm not really sure where to go for here. Ive looked at solutions people have posted but hasn't fixed it.

replies.body:
Are you using Windows 8? I'm pretty sure Windows 8 had this problem. Updating to Windows 8.1 should fix it.

I hate how they mention "It's free!", implying that usually updates cost money.
